name: Pixel Canvas
description: Collaborative app where users create pixel art with others in real-time. Uses WebSockets for live canvas updates and chat messages.

name: Word Pal
description: Vocabulary building app that supports saving words and categorizing them. Utilizes Discord/Google OAuth2 to facilitate user accounts.

name: Flamin' Finger
description: Precise recreation of the 2003 arcade game plus online leaderboards. Employs a randomized DFS algorithm for path generation.

name: Shot Clock
description: Billiards shot clock compliant with competitive play. Integrates WebSockets for user-created clocks and real time synchronization across all connections.

name: Photo Tagging App
description: A Where's Waldo style game with an online leaderboard. Encorporates Firebase for anonymous accounts as well as storage of locational data and scores.

name: Monty Hall
description: Interactive exercise for exploring the Monty Hall problem. Includes a simulator to show how probability changes based on door choice.

name: Age Calculator
description: App to view someone's exact age by years, months, or days. Employs search parameters to create savable and shareable stats.

name: Dodgeball
description: Survival game with highscore tracking. Simulates elastic collisions between balls on a two-dimensional, frictionless plane.

name: Musical Temperaments
description: Keyboard that can be tuned to different temperaments in any key. Playable by mouse, keyboard, touch, and MIDI controllers.
